member.name: M:AutoMapper.AdvancedConfiguration.BeforeSeal(System.Action{AutoMapper.IConfigurationProvider})
member.summary: Add Action called against the IConfigurationProvider before it gets sealed

member.name: M:AutoMapper.AdvancedConfiguration.Validator(System.Action{AutoMapper.ValidationContext})
member.summary: Add an action to be called when validating the configuration.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AdvancedConfiguration.AllowAdditiveTypeMapCreation
member.summary: Allow the same map to exist in different profiles. The default is to throw an exception, true means the maps are merged.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AdvancedConfiguration.MaxExecutionPlanDepth
member.summary: How many levels deep should AutoMapper try to inline the execution plan for child classes. See the docs for details.

member.name: T:AutoMapper.AutoMapAttribute
member.summary: Auto map to this destination type from the specified source type. Discovered during scanning assembly scanning for configuration when calling

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AutoMapAttribute.ConstructUsingServiceLocator
member.summary: If set to true, construct the destination object using the service locator.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AutoMapAttribute.MaxDepth
member.summary: For self-referential types, limit recurse depth.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AutoMapAttribute.PreserveReferences
member.summary: If set to true, preserve object identity. Useful for circular references.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AutoMapAttribute.DisableCtorValidation
member.summary: If set to true, disable constructor validation.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AutoMapAttribute.IncludeAllDerived
member.summary: If set to true, include this configuration in all derived types' maps.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.AutoMapAttribute.TypeConverter
member.summary: Skip normal member mapping and convert using a instantiated during mapping.

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.IgnoreAttribute
member.summary: Ignore this member for configuration validation and skip during mapping.
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.MapAtRuntimeAttribute
member.summary: Do not precompute the execution plan for this member, just map it at runtime. Simplifies the execution plan by not inlining.
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.MappingOrderAttribute
member.summary: Supply a custom mapping order instead of what the .NET runtime returns
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.NullSubstituteAttribute
member.summary: Substitute a custom value when the source member resolves as null
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.NullSubstituteAttribute.Value
member.summary: Value to use if source value is null

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.SourceMemberAttribute
member.summary: Specify the source member to map from. Can only reference a member on the type
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.UseExistingValueAttribute
member.summary: Use the destination value instead of mapping from the source value or creating a new instance
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.ValueConverterAttribute
member.summary: Specify a value converter type to convert from the matching source member to the destination member Use with to specify a separate source member to supply to the value converter
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.ValueConverterAttribute.Type
member.summary: type

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.ValueResolverAttribute
member.summary: Map destination member using a custom value resolver. Use with to specify an type.
member.remarks: Must be used in combination with

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Configuration.Annotations.ValueResolverAttribute.Type
member.summary: or type

member.summary: Specify which fields should be mapped. By default only public fields are mapped.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Configuration.IProfileConfiguration.ShouldMapMethod
member.summary: Specify which methods, of those that are eligible (public, parameterless, and non-static or extension methods), should be mapped. By default all eligible methods are mapped.

member.summary: Specify which constructors should be considered for the destination objects. By default all constructors are considered.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.IMemberConfigurationExpression`3.ConvertUsing``2
member.summary: Specify a value converter to convert from the matching source member to the destination member
member.remarks: Value converters are similar to type converters, but scoped to a single member. Value resolvers receive the enclosed source/destination objects as parameters. Value converters do not. This makes it possible to reuse value converters across multiple members and multiple maps.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.IMemberConfigurationExpression`3.ConvertUsing``2(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,``1}})
member.summary: Specify a value converter to convert from the specified source member to the destination member
member.remarks: Value converters are similar to type converters, but scoped to a single member. Value resolvers receive the enclosed source/destination objects as parameters. Value converters do not. This makes it possible to reuse value converters across multiple members and multiple maps.
member.param: Source member to supply to the value converter

member.summary: Add a property name to globally ignore. Matches against the beginning of the property names.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.IProfileExpression.AllowNullDestinationValues
member.summary: Allow null destination values. If false, destination objects will be created for deep object graphs. Default true.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.IProfileExpression.AllowNullCollections
member.summary: Allow null destination collections. If true, null source collections result in null destination collections. Default false.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.IProfileExpression.EnableNullPropagationForQueryMapping
member.summary: Allows to enable null-value propagation for query mapping. Some providers (such as EntityFrameworkQueryVisitor) do not work with this feature enabled!
